page.title: 06EDUCATION IN BASSALEG
page.content: OUR NEW SCHOOL Our new school will be called Pentrepoeth County Primary School.As you can imagine,if two schools join together it is going to take up a big area.We are in a very old school now andwe will be looking forward to it because it will have many more facilities.There will be a large hall which will be nice because ours at Bassaleg was burnt down.The school will be big enough for 35O junior and infant pupils.There will be hard play yards and grass areas for us to play games and sports.We haven't got a field now so that will be fun.The foreman on the building site says it is due to be finished in July 1986,but they are hoping to finish 3 months earlier.We will probably move in September 1986.
